Facebook.title: Facebook
bullets: Working on the Messenger Kids Experience Team!

JPMorgan Chase.title: JPMorgan Chase & Co.
bullets: Worked as a Full-Stack Developer to deliver an end-to-end web application to create test data to post to Kafka topics
Developed data generation page and input validation techniques in React front-end and scheduled data creation, random data generation, and REST API in Java back-end.
Helped with connecting several endpoints and internal data models and in architecting user workflow and application functionality.
Worked with authentication protocols to enable deployment to internal cloud environment.
JPMorgan Chase.body:
Worked as a Full-Stack Developer to deliver an end-to-end web application to create test data to post to Kafka topics 
            • Developed data generation page and input validation techniques in React front-end and scheduled data creation, random data generation, and REST API in Java back-end. • Helped with connecting several endpoints and internal data models and in architecting user workflow and application functionality. Also worked with authentication protocols to enable deployment to internal cloud environment.

Plano Intelligence.title: Plano Intelligence Inc.
bullets: Created an Android app for threat detection. Focused on front-end decisions, troubleshooting, and development.
Developed and tested app with Android Studio and Java, enabled and connected notification database, and delivered real-time WebSocket connectivity.
Plano Intelligence.body:
Created an Android app for threat detection. Focused on front-end decisions, troubleshooting, and development.
Developed and tested app with Android Studio and Java, enabled and connected notification database, and delivered real-time WebSocket connectivity.

Kellermann Foundation.title: Kellermann Foundation
bullets: Worked with the Kellermann Foundation through the Engineering Projects in Community Service (EPICS) program at UTD.
Advised technicians in Uganda on how to integrate their local database to a newly developed government database framework.
Analyzed Java and SQL source code and presented final report on findings.

Kumon.title: Kumon Math and Reading Center
bullets: Taught children from K-10th grade in Math and English. Graded homework and created specialized lesson plans for each student.
Managed busy storefront with 30-45 students and occasional parents.
Kumon.body: Taught children from K-10th grade in Math and English. Graded homework and created specialized lesson plans for each student.

NanoSpinCompute Lab.title: NanoSpinCompute Lab
NanoSpinCompute Lab.body: Wrote a report on the usability and logical techniques of implementing Threshold Logic in 3D perpendicular Nanomagnetic Logic circuits.

Advanced Polymer Research Lab.title: Advanced Polymer Research Lab
Advanced Polymer Research Lab.body: Researched correlation between the glass transition temperature of shape memory polymers and their post-cure time through Dynamic Mechanical Analysis (DMA). Used Matlab for data analysis and visualization.

Multiscale Simulation Lab.title: Multiscale Simulation Lab
Multiscale Simulation Lab.body: Modeled the behavior of MnO for more efficient battery material using CTMEAM. Created Bash scripts to automate simulation and testing. Used Matlab for analysis and LaTeX to write final report.
